archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.4.10f: f) action is taken to stop illegal activity (e.g. establishing injunctions against attacking internet domains and having websites shut down that are masquerading as the organisation).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
